column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I had brunch here at about 10AM on a Sunday with my parents and my wife.  We ordered quickly and the display of pastries was great.  We ordered a kougn aman and it was great.  Just what a sweet croissant should taste like.  I ordered the tamale Benedict and it was great.  Tangy sauce
column2: with excellent tamales.  My wife ordered fried chicken and biscuit.  It was also great.  The gravy was very rich and porky and the chicken was seasoned well and lightly battered.
